description.value: You achieved fluency in different languages with each reincarnation, and your brain remembers much of the grammar, idioms, and obscenities that you spouted in old lives. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Truespeech] as a 5th-rank occult innate spell that you can cast once a day on yourself only. While the spell is active, you get a +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks while speaking to a creature in a language other than Common.

publication.title: Pathfinder #199: To Bloom Below the Web
